title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: The statistic presents the Leading primetime TV of the average TV U.S. viewed U.S. user as of TV U.S. 2015 .
During the survey , 43 % of respondents stated they would choose Movies primetime if they could only listen to 7 genre of primetime for the rest of their lives .
The most popular answer was Sitcoms_or_comedy , which 48 % of respondents selected as the 7 genre of primetime they would listen to for the rest of their lives .
gold: This graph shows the leading genres of primetime TV programming viewed regularly in the United States as of May 2015 . During a survey , 48 percent of respondents stated they regularly watched sitcoms or comedy shows on TV during primetime . Movies , part of the billion-dollar film industry , are the second most common genre on primetime TV programming .
